segments.transcription: ([SR 0] wh-) When the sunlight strikes raindrops in the air they act as a ([SR 0] p) prism and form a rainbow. The rainbow is a ([B 1]) division of white light into many beautiful colors.
These take the shape of a ([P 0] l) long round arc ([P 0] w) with its ([SR 0] b-) beyond ([B 2]) ([P 0] w) with its
([B 1]) path high above and is ([B 1]) true ([SR 0] a-) apparently beyond [B 0] the horizon.
